2d70fbc7-681b-44d0-9408-bea519648ad8.content: DONE: Story --criteria flag, shared render for criteria display, backfilled criteria on all 5 stories, AGENTS.md install-agnostic (no hardcoded uv run), README with full docs. 72 tests passing.

55f1151a-336a-43a0-8280-197b4387b5c1.content: Criteria support added to stories. README and AGENTS.md polished. All v1 features done. Remaining: node stats command (todo). Ready to commit cumulative update.

2191070d-0c62-4eb7-bc7b-de1fe14cf512.benefit: Agents can resolve skills across Anthropic standard and story-driven formats using keyword matching over folder names and descriptions.
criteria: Support skill.json story-driven parsing with nesting awareness
Resolve repos from user-level config and env vars
skills resolve matches folder name and description by keyword
Expose CLI commands for list and resolve

b7c67f58-fb56-4cd9-99bd-f002a350aa65.test_scenario: Given dual-format skill data, when loaded, then unified and format-specific Pydantic models validate parsed skill metadata and content
b7c67f58-fb56-4cd9-99bd-f002a350aa65.expected_result: SkillInfo, StandardSkill, StoryDrivenSkill, FeatureExt, SkillFeature, SkillsConfig models with tests

e4b51102-1d16-4937-8c5a-1ab1f71ae9e0.test_scenario: Given a skill folder, when marker files are present, then parser modules load either SKILL.md (standard) or skill.json (+ skill.md) story-driven
e4b51102-1d16-4937-8c5a-1ab1f71ae9e0.expected_result: Separate parsers/standard.py and parsers/story_driven.py with format-specific tests

34a10afc-c1d1-4668-8cd6-3c3670c70cdc.test_scenario: Given ~/.config/pvrclawk/config.toml and env vars, when loading config, then repo and group paths are merged and deduplicated
34a10afc-c1d1-4668-8cd6-3c3670c70cdc.expected_result: Load skills_repo[], skills_group[], skills_format[]; merge MY_SKILLS_REPO and SKILLS_GROUP_DIR

cbc3df8c-bc51-45d0-8bfc-03e5b9531ad7.test_scenario: Given multiple skill repos, when resolving keywords, then matching uses folder names and descriptions with ranked results
cbc3df8c-bc51-45d0-8bfc-03e5b9531ad7.expected_result: Recursive scan of skills/ folders, format detection, keyword ranking: exact-name > partial-name > description

18bf4b37-f8e2-403b-bf13-b4752e484eaa.test_scenario: Given root pvrclawk command, when skills group is invoked, then list and resolve commands expose discovered and parsed skills
18bf4b37-f8e2-403b-bf13-b4752e484eaa.expected_result: Add src/pvrclawk/skills package, register in app.py, commands: skills list, skills resolve

f06f56bd-36c6-4ef2-8d67-b1f1fac76ed8.content: DONE: Implemented skills v1 with dual-format parsing (SKILL.md + skill.json), user-level config merge (~/.config/pvrclawk + env vars), scanner/resolver, skills list/resolve CLI, and AGENTS folder split. 87 tests passing.

80c2687d-0b10-4c6b-8942-c04f399b4921.content: Skills v1 delivered: dual-format skill resolution, user-level skills config, CLI list/resolve, and AGENTS folder docs. Next likely step: add skills show and execution pipeline for dynamic contexts/templating.

473f797f-443f-4762-b352-f9535ce5333c.content: DONE: Added human-readable skills listing via 'pvrclawk skills list --human'. Full test suite now at 88 passing.

689392e0-354e-482c-9454-9387ea20c7d6.content: Membank synced with latest changes. Skills v1 is complete, including --human display for skills list. 88 tests passing. Next optional step: skills show and execution pipeline for dynamic contexts/templating.

3909d01b-0cfe-4f72-81ac-5e9b919d69e9.test_scenario: Given nested story-driven skills, when listed or resolved, then name shows full parent path with '/' delimiter
3909d01b-0cfe-4f72-81ac-5e9b919d69e9.expected_result: Display nested skill as parent/child path instead of leaf-only name

63aeb86f-0716-48ab-a22d-b55cc2de7e12.content: IN_PROGRESS: Fix nested story-driven skill display to include full parent path using '/' delimiter. Starting with failing tests.

00c5c39c-9028-402f-87ca-8d544c3cf9a9.content: DONE: Story-driven nested skills now display full parent path with '/' delimiter (e.g., use-skill/find). Added TDD coverage for scanner and human list output. 89 tests passing.

7cb42329-a6b5-4907-bcd2-12cb937b38c9.content: Nested story-driven path display fixed. Skills list/resolve now expose nested names as parent/child (slash-delimited). Test suite green at 89. Next: optional skills show command.

0fd1150c-c8a2-4ac6-94d5-b50ab4360d1e.test_scenario: Given skills resolve, when options are passed, then output supports full detail view or path-only view
0fd1150c-c8a2-4ac6-94d5-b50ab4360d1e.expected_result: Add --full and --path-only options to skills resolve command

2e36564d-763f-4052-a61c-5d2dde0576ba.content: IN_PROGRESS: Add skills resolve options for full detail output and path-only output. Starting with failing tests.

bf4aff77-5d8b-43ca-8821-91a8189320dc.content: DONE: Added skills resolve output modes: --full (includes path) and --path-only (path-only output). Added integration tests and kept default output unchanged. 91 tests passing.

bed8d804-b2a6-4475-b91e-ee61e78b9b26.content: Resolve command now supports --full and --path-only modes. Nested path display and human list view are complete. Test suite green at 91. use-skill/find removal now has parity for path output.

9fca2439-7473-474f-8829-530e163cac4c.test_scenario: Given configured skill repos, when skills update runs, then each repo with .git performs git pull and non-git repos are skipped
9fca2439-7473-474f-8829-530e163cac4c.expected_result: Migrate use-skill/update behavior into pvrclawk skills update

0b50da9a-a5b2-48f9-ab21-f1ab3ed36d0b.content: IN_PROGRESS: Migrating skill repo update behavior to native pvrclawk skills update command using .git detection and git pull.

cace288f-d525-4570-9f59-81931b8a77c0.content: DONE: Migrated use-skill/update behavior to native 'pvrclawk skills update'. Command checks for .git and runs git pull only for git repos; non-git repos are skipped. Added unit/integration tests. 94 tests passing.

8aa95df4-0b23-4cbc-ad8e-48b98cdd8caa.content: Skills update command migrated with .git-based git pull behavior. Resolve supports default/full/path-only modes. Nested path display fixed. Test suite green at 94.

0ac879c2-83c7-4809-96d6-7ee2b11e96ba.test_scenario: Given skills update command, when -a/--all is passed, then all configured repos are processed; without it command should prompt explicit intent
0ac879c2-83c7-4809-96d6-7ee2b11e96ba.expected_result: Add -a/--all option and require it for bulk update

e7110da5-a490-4d28-8ed0-2eaab891a896.content: IN_PROGRESS: Add required -a/--all option to skills update and remove update command from AGENTS instructions.

06a8a324-5e0c-4aa1-8e6f-fe10901ef486.content: DONE: skills update now requires -a/--all for bulk updates. Without flag, command returns usage guidance. AGENTS skills instruction no longer includes update command (user-level operation). 95 tests passing.

a1eb214d-914c-48c6-ab67-44c1dcb0c507.content: skills update is now explicit via -a/--all and excluded from agent instructions. Skills resolve/list/update suite is stable. Test suite green at 95.
